snippet.title: Submarine Commander for the Atari 8-bit family
snippet.description:
Came also out for:

???


Game description:

Submarine Commander is a submarine simulation game.

You take the role of a submarine commander (hence the name) and it is your task to shoot down hostile ships - raging from patrol boats to heavy tankers.


What I think:

Even though I am not into submarine simulations I really enjoyed this game. 

Still, I have to nitpick a little bit. I don't like how the periscope keeps moving to the left when I want it to go the right, and vice-versa.
